title: #3: American Wars
description:
After NAFTA gutted American manufacturing, the only thing left to manufacture and export these days are bombs and missiles. When American foreign policy is guided by the lobbyists of Lockheed Martin and Raytheon, how can we expect anything other than endless wars?

When “spreading democracy” is sold to the public as a patriotic endeavor just because the description sounds noble, not a lot of support is given to those that wish to examine whether or not America is actually focused on delivering democracy to foreign countries, or perhaps actually interested in something more devious.

By the way, the audio quality gets better as the episodes go on.
